titleStmt.title: Discourses concerning government by Algernon Sidney ... ; published from an original manuscript of the author.
titleStmt.author: Sidney, Algernon, 1622-1683.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed, and are to be sold by the booksellers of London and Westminster,

notesStmt.note: "This is an answer to Filmer's 'Patriarcha'." cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
